chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Welcome back everyone and now I'm so excited for this series of videos as well because we're going to talk about pandas

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: I wish I could give this guy a high five in real life. How beautiful of an animal is this panda?

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Now the thing about pandas is they've usually got black ears with white face and some of them have black around their eyes

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: But in rare cases you get different patterns of black

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: No, I'm kidding where we're not talking about the animal pandas, but that would be pretty cool

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: We're talking about the data analysis library pandas now if you're doing machine learning or data science in

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Huythin you're going to be using pandas and it's used to explore data

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Analyze data manipulate data get it ready for machine learning. So that's what we're going to be focused on

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So if we revisit our framework

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: We've got this data modeling section here. We've been through these steps

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Now we're going to really start to get into some of the tools that we can use

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So let's change this up a little

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: We've still got our framework up here

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: But now we're starting to dive into these tools. We've covered Jupyter notebooks

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: We've looked at anaconda and mini-conda. We've set up an environment using those

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Now we're going to start diving in to doing data analysis first with things like pandas, map plot, lemma, numpy and then later on we'll look at some machine learning

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: But for now we're focused on pandas, which is part of usually part of these three steps here the data analysis section

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Now why pandas?

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Well first of all it's simple to use

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: It's integrated with many other data science and machine learning python tools because that's what we're focused on

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Right, we want to find machine learning and data science tools in python and use our knowledge of python to use those tools

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: to gain insights out of data and build machine learning models and

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Often times you'll get your data in a format that isn't quite ready for machine learning

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: The data is there, but fairly often you have to go through a few steps to make your data in a format that can be

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Imported into a machine learning algorithm and so that's where pandas comes in

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: It helps us take a raw table of data raw data means data that you've just gathered and then manipulate it

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Ready so you can use it with machine learning algorithms

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So what are we going to cover in this section?

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Well, because pandas is so vast it would take quite a long time to look at the entire library

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So we're going to be focused on the most useful functions things that you'll use

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Basically in every data analysis that you do

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: We'll look at the different types of pandas data types. There's two main ones series and data frame

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: But we'll look at that in a second

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Look at how to import and export data using pandas

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Different ways you can describe your data

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So if you just imported some of your data

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: How can you describe that statistically like what is the average value of a certain column etc

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Pandas is so beautiful in that it allows you to view and select your data in almost any way that you can imagine

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So if you can think of it you can probably do it in pandas and then finally once we've described

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Our data once we've seen it once we know how to select it

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: We'll look at how we can change it up and manipulate it and we can massage it into a format that's ready for our machine learning algorithms

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So I think it's important before we actually start to jump into doing the actual code is to remember where you can get help

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: As we go through these videos

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Follow along with the code in a Jupyter notebook if you can if you can't

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: While the video is going don't worry just watch the video watch it as I go through it and then go through it on your own after the videos

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Done it's very important to try and just write the code yourself if in doubt

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: Just run your code and don't worry if it an arrow pops up

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: There's different places you can look such as stack overflow or pandas documentation to figure out what's gone wrong

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: The most important is to try for yourself and then to try it again because this is what will help you learn

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: So if in doubt run the code and then if you're still stuck don't forget

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: It's always okay to ask a question. There's never a silly question

chunks.title: Pandas Introduction.mp3
chunks.text: That's an overview of what we're going to cover what pandas is where to get help. Let's dive in and start coding
